General.Name: Anhui Hwasu Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Anhui Hwasu Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of chlor-alkali chemical products in China. Its products portfolio includes polyvinyl chloride, caustic soda, liquid chlorine, synthetic hydrochloric acid, bleaching disinfectant, chlorine; and paraffin, chlorinated polymers, pesticides, alkali consumption/chlorine fine chemicals, and intermediates. The company also offers raw salt and electric limestone. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Chuzhou, China.
